Articles.Content:
This post was requested by the Reddit moderators to confirm that I am linuxgurugamer on reddit as well as here.

LGG

can confirm its him. 

Why am i typing this? lol
I am suspicious ... can you please make a post on reddit confirming you are the same person? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
A PM would have been better? Plus... would you not need to post a hashed and salted public key to **really** confirm identity?
This post confirms that I have read this thread and had nothing better to say.

Half-Life 3 Confirmed?

Am I doing this right?
Closing this thread. The purpose is fulfilled. OP can link to this thread if need be.
